Subjects: hymns, to God; God, hymns to
_description: ?James Ryman, A hymn to God the Father in James Ryman’s song book — ten quatrains (aaab) with refrain ‘Te deum laudamus’ and burden (bc): ‘Te deum laudamus / Te dominum confitemur’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Eternall god ffader of lightThatt madist althyng by þi grete
                    myght…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Only by loue as seieth oure credeTe deum
                    laudamus
